com.mostc.pftt.model.sapi
Class BuiltinWebServerManager

java.lang.Object
  com.mostc.pftt.model.Build
      com.mostc.pftt.model.sapi.SAPIManager
          com.mostc.pftt.model.sapi.WebServerManager
              com.mostc.pftt.model.sapi.AbstractManagedProcessesWebServerManager
                  com.mostc.pftt.model.sapi.BuiltinWebServerManager

@ThreadSafe
public class BuiltinWebServerManager
extends AbstractManagedProcessesWebServerManager

manages local instances of PHP's builtin web server can have multiple concurrent BuiltinWebServerInstances, assigning each one a different TCP port number.

Author:
Matt Ficken
